name: garden & snake
description:
you are a tiny snake in a garden, looking for some friends. try to find all of them. or just whichever ones you want, your call.

notes: arrow keys to move. you can double jump, & one platform has a non-obvious thing you can do.

(this is my first rough attempt at a platform game and it's mostly a gift for my partners/family. if you're not them, it might not mean that much to you.)
